actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week commencing on June 13, 1982 as "National Welfare Fraud Prevention Week".

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should declare the week commencing on June 13, 1982, as National Welfare Fraud Prevention Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week commencing on June 13, 1982 as "National Welfare Fraud Prevention Week".
